  xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
    <FrameLayout android:id="@id/status_reactions_new_grid" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="fill_parent">
        <LinearLayout android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
            <include android:id="@id/status_reactions_type_toggle_container" android:visibility="gone"
